30 CpuInterfaceCore::CpuInterfaceCore(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
31 {
32  ROS_DEBUG("CpuInterfaceCore::ctor - ctor");
33 
34  init(nh);
35  startReadingData();
36 
37  ROS_INFO("CpuInterfaceCore::ctor - Started");
38 }
39 
43 CpuInterfaceCore::~CpuInterfaceCore()
44 {
45  if (_read_hardware_data_thread.joinable())
46  _read_hardware_data_thread.join();
47 }
48 
53 bool CpuInterfaceCore::init(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
54 {
55  ROS_DEBUG("CpuInterfaceCore::init - Init parameters...");
56  initParameters(nh);
57 
58  ROS_DEBUG("CpuInterfaceCore::init - Starting services...");
59  startServices(nh);
60 
61  ROS_DEBUG("CpuInterfaceCore::init - Starting publishers...");
62  startPublishers(nh);
63 
64  ROS_DEBUG("CpuInterfaceCore::init - Starting subscribers...");
65  startSubscribers(nh);
66 
67  return true;
68 }
69 
74 void CpuInterfaceCore::initParameters(ros::NodeHandle &nh)
75 {
76  nh.getParam("read_rpi_diagnostics_frequency", _read_cpu_frequency);
77  nh.getParam("temperature_warn_threshold", _temperature_warn_threshold);
78  nh.getParam("temperature_shutdown_threshold", _temperature_shutdown_threshold);
79  nh.getParam("simulation_mode", _simulation_mode);
80 
81  ROS_DEBUG("CPU Interface::initParameters - Read temperature frequency %f", _read_cpu_frequency);
82  ROS_DEBUG("CPU Interface::initParameters - Temperature warn threshold %d", _temperature_warn_threshold);
83  ROS_DEBUG("CPU Interface::initParameters - Temperature shutdown threshold %d", _temperature_shutdown_threshold);
84  ROS_DEBUG("CPU Interface::initParameters - Simulation mode : %s", _simulation_mode ? "True" : "False");
85 }

100 void CpuInterfaceCore::startSubscribers(ros::NodeHandle & /*nh*/) { ROS_DEBUG("CpuInterfaceCore::startSubscribers - no subscribers to start"); }
101 
105 void CpuInterfaceCore::_readCpuTemperature()
106 {
107  std::fstream cpu_temp_file("/sys/class/thermal/thermal_zone0/temp", std::fstream::in);
108  if (cpu_temp_file.good())
109  {
110  int read_temp = 0;
111  cpu_temp_file >> read_temp;
112  if (read_temp > 0)
113  {
114  _cpu_temperature = read_temp / 1000;
115  }
116 
117  cpu_temp_file.close();
118  }
119 }
120 
124 void CpuInterfaceCore::startReadingData() { _read_hardware_data_thread = std::thread(&CpuInterfaceCore::_readHardwareDataLoop, this); }
125 
129 void CpuInterfaceCore::_readHardwareDataLoop()
130 {
131  ros::Rate read_rpi_diagnostics_rate = ros::Rate(_read_cpu_frequency);
132 
133  while (ros::ok())
134  {
135  _readCpuTemperature();
136 
137  if (!_simulation_mode)
138  {
139  // check if Rpi is too hot
140  if (_cpu_temperature > _temperature_warn_threshold)
141  {
142  ROS_WARN("CpuInterfaceCore::_readHardwareDataLoop - Rpi temperature is really high !");
143  }
144  if (_cpu_temperature > _temperature_shutdown_threshold)
145  {
146  ROS_ERROR("CpuInterfaceCore::_readHardwareDataLoop - Rpi is too hot, shutdown to avoid any damage");
147  int ret = std::system("sudo shutdown now");
148  ROS_INFO("CpuInterfaceCore::_readHardwareDataLoop - Shutdown now: %d", ret);
149  }
150  }
151  else
152  {
153  if (_cpu_temperature > _temperature_warn_threshold)
154  {
155  ROS_WARN("CpuInterfaceCore::_readHardwareDataLoop - Computer temperature is really high !");
156  }
157  if (_cpu_temperature > _temperature_shutdown_threshold)
158  {
159  ROS_ERROR("CpuInterfaceCore::_readHardwareDataLoop - Computer is too hot");
160  }
161  }
162 
163  read_rpi_diagnostics_rate.sleep();
164  }
165 }
166 } // namespace cpu_interface
